hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:(the mother of faithful believers) Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saw some nasal secretions, expectoration or sputum on the wall of the mosque in the direction of the Qibla and scraped it off

chapter.ara-name: باب حَكِّ الْبُزَاقِ بِالْيَدِ مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: To scrape off the sputum from the mosque with the hand (using some tool or other, or using n tool)
